item.title: Danny Yagan - About
item.description: Curriculum vitae. Danny Yagan is Assistant Professor of Economics at the University of California-Berkeley, Faculty Research Fellow of the National Bureau of Economic Research, and Faculty Director of the Taxation and Inequality Initiative of the Berkeley Opportunity Lab. His research uses large datasets and natural experiments to study U.S. tax policy, business investment, income inequality, upward mobility, and recession recovery. In 2018 he was awarded a Sloan Foundation Research Fellowship for early-career contributions.
